This script combines count data with nest development data, ovary data and body size data 


#Load relevant packages 
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot)
```

#Import datafiles
```{r}
NestDevelopment<-read.csv("../SarroFisher/Data/NestDissections.csv")
head(NestDevelopment)

Ovary<-read.csv("../SarroFisher/Data/Ovarydata.csv") %>% rename(beeID=WorkerID) %>% rename(nestID=ColonyID)
head(Ovary)
Bodysize<-read.csv("../SarroFisher/Data/bodysizeworkers.csv") %>% rename(beeID=Worker.ID) %>% rename(nestID=Microcolony.ID)
head(Bodysize)
Counts<-read.csv("../SarroFisher/Data/countsanalysis.csv")
head(Counts)

#Combine nestID and beeID for ovary, bodysize and counts so they can be combined 



```
